name: Pixel Puzzle (Veins)
description:
Pixel Puzzle is a retro-inspired game. Move and rotate various pieces, to form a specific shape on the grid. These pieces must not overlap with each other.


The game contains 9 puzzles, an animated tutorial and various backgrounds. I'm planning to add many more puzzles and even an editor, so please leave a comment with your thoughts!

The game has 2 free variants:
A full color version with shovels and an 8-bit version with cats! Enjoy!
